holdfast-fab.title: Holdâˆ™Fast
holdfast-fab.description: I created an original branding idea for Holdfast Fabrication in Portland, OR.

insignia-health.title: Insignia
insignia-health.caption: Mockups and new proposed branding for Insignia Health
insignia-health.description: I redesigned and rebuilt the Insignia Health public website.

the-gospel-coalition.title: TGC
the-gospel-coalition.caption: The website of the 2015 TGC National Conference
the-gospel-coalition.description: I did the bulk of the front-end implementation of the 2015 TGC National Conference website.

redeemer-church.title: Redeemer Church
redeemer-church.caption: Some sermon artwork showing use of Redeemer's brand
redeemer-church.description: I led a creative team to brand our new church, build a website and produce brand-related assets like sermon artwork.

under-armour.title: Under Armour
under-armour.caption: The 2014-2015 Winter Catalog Technology Experience
under-armour.description: We were tasked with building an interactive parallax experience for the UA 2014-2015 Winter Catalog.

mozo-shoes.title: Mozo Shoes
mozo-shoes.caption: Screenshots from the MozoShoes.com redesign
mozo-shoes.description: We did a complete front-end redesign and refresh of MozoShoes.com

groove-game.title: Groove Game
groove-game.caption: iOS App Concept
groove-game.description: Katasi Groove is an application concept that rewards drivers for driving safely.

athey-creek.title: Athey Creek
athey-creek.caption: Front-end development, design, photogrpahy, and creative direction
athey-creek.description: Athey Creek Christian Fellowship is a non-denominational Christian church in Wilsonville, OR. Their hallmark since 1996 is their commitment to teaching through the Bible. Under the leadership of Pastor Brett Meador and the elders, the church has grown from a small group of believers meeting in a school to an average weekly attendance of 2,500+.

dapper-and-wise.title: Dapper & Wise
dapper-and-wise.caption: A single-page site with original photography
dapper-and-wise.description: Dapper & Wise Roasters is a premier, artisan coffee roasting outfit in the suburbs of Portland, OR. Run by Evan Aldrete and Tyler Geel, this fabulous duo roasts, craft, and brew some amazing java.

insomnia-coffee-co.title: Insomnia
insomnia-coffee-co.caption: A completely redesigned website with original photography
insomnia-coffee-co.description: Insomnia Coffee Co. started in the NW with the goal of bringing a rich, artisan coffee experience to the suburbs of Portland, OR. They have succeeded and even expanded with a location in Cannon Beach and now roast their own coffee. Evan and Tyler are masterminds of good coffee, great ambience, and an original style that is all their own.

songs-for-saplings.title: Saplings
songs-for-saplings.caption: An original site and revamped branding, built from scratch
songs-for-saplings.description: Songs for Saplings is the ministry of James and Dana Dirksen. They marry orthodox Christian catechesis with fresh, original music for children and families. Their desire is to see the truth of God's Word take root in the hearts of children and families that the Gospel message might reach many people and that God would be glorified.

determine.title: Determine
determine.caption: Sampling of my design and web work for Determine
determine.description: Determine is a ministry that my wife and I began several years ago. Born out of our own challenges and struggles, we wanted to see Jesus Christ and His life, death, resurrection, and ascension be known by all peoples in every aspect of life.

nightwind.title: Nightwind
nightwind.caption: An original branding and custom site for Nightwind
nightwind.description: Nightwind Productions is the brainchild of [Nate DeCoste](https://twitter.com/NateDeCoste). It is a Christian publishing company that will ultimately house his original youth ministry, curriculum, plays, original writing, and a magazine on Christianity and culture for youth and youth leaders.

compass.title: Compass
compass.caption: Samples of my design work for Compass
compass.description: Compass was founded in the 1990s by Joseph K. Meyer as a boutique investment consultancy. After forays in and out of the fund-of-funds and consultancy space, Compass is again pursuing the offering of boutique investment services abroad.

raleigh-hills-dental.title: RH Dental
raleigh-hills-dental.caption: A custom website, built from scratch for Raleigh Hills Dental
raleigh-hills-dental.description: Raleigh Hills Dental is one of a trio of offices in the Portland area run by Robert and Dan Rodriquez. These crazy brothers are awesome guys, that have a family approach to dental care, providing their services in a warm and inviting atmosphere.
